text: Steve Tran (born 22 April 1985) is a French Vietnamese film and television actor. He has appeared in numerous titles, and in 2009, he recorded the soundtrack 'We Can Make It' for the film Tricheuse.Steve Tran FilmographySteve Tran Personal Information File ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- !
